posts.post_title: WTB T206 Cobb (Red Portrait) with the following backs
posts.post_content:
Hey Everyone.. 

I am looking to buy the following 6 backs for the red portrait Cobb:

  * Sov 460
  * Pied 460 Fact 42
  * AB 350
  * Carolina Brights
  * T213 Type 1
  * T213 Type 3


Please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you would like to work out a sale or some type of a trade.
Jamie
